1.speaker: A
sentence: I owe you an apology. I forget your birthday.
내가 너에게 사과할게 있어. 나 잊었었어 니 생일을.

3.speaker: A
sentence: I promise it'll never happen again.

4.speaker: B
sentence: No problem. It could happen to anyone.
괜찮아. 이건 그럴 수 있어 누구에게나 일어날 수.

5.speaker: A
sentence: I want to make up for missing it.

6.speaker: B
sentence: Forget it. I don't want to twist your arm.
(사례, 사과에 대해) 이제 괜찮아. 나 원치 않아 엎드려 절 받기.
